text: 23|14|tara pichata ami sukrabinduka alakata parainata karao, pichata alakaka parainata karao mansapindata, mansapindaka parainata karao asthita, tara pichata asthika dhaki di'om mansarae, arasesata ami taka garhi tolom ana eta srstiraupe. Eteke (coraa) sarbottama srasta allaha kimana barakatamaya
